TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 通过客户端应用程序服务实现 Windows 身份验证。

span.span: Enables Windows authentication with client application services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过使用 Windows 身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using Windows authentication. 若要启用 Windows 身份验证，请将应用程序配置为使用 类。To enable Windows authentication, you configure your application to use the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services). 配置后，可以通过调用方法来验证用户 `static` 。After configuration, you can validate users by calling the `static` method. 方法在内部调用 方法。The method internally calls the method. 方法自动对当前用户进行身份验证，并将 `static` 属性设置为 包含当前的对象 。The method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 如果为 应用程序配置了，则可以使用 对象从角色服务中检索用户角色信息。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. 您可以通过属性检索对当前实例的引用 `static` 。You can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the `static` property. 您可以使用成员资格提供程序引用直接调用 方法。You can use the membership provider reference to call the method directly. 此外，还需要成员资格提供程序引用来调用 方法，该方法在基类中不可用 。Additionally, you will need the membership provider reference to call the method, which is not available in the base class. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法通过使用 Windows 身份验证对用户进行身份验证。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication. 在此示例中，将属性的值 `static` 强制转换为 实例。In this example, the value of the `static` property is cast to a instance. 这可以确保 如果你使用另一个成员资格提供程序意外测试此代码，将引发。This makes sure that a will be thrown if you accidentally test this code by using another membership provider. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#309)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#309)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户登录到计算机或域时，Windows 身份验证使用操作系统提供的标识。Windows authentication uses the identity supplied by the operating system when a user logs on to the computer or domain. 因此，与用户凭据相关的属性与此类无关。Therefore, properties related to user credentials are not relevant for this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Logout ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Logout() cil managed
Public Sub Logout ()
public: void Logout();
member this.Logout : unit -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于通过客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证的用户， `static` 属性设置为可 访问配置的角色服务的对象。For users authenticated through client application services, the `static` property is set to a object that enables access to the configured role service. 方法将属性重置 为 包含当前的对象 。The method resets the property to a object that contains the current . 调用此方法后，你将不能再通过类为用户检索角色 。After you call this method, you can no longer retrieve roles for the user through the class. 若要对当前用户重新进行身份验证，请调用 方法。To reauthenticate the current user, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法注销用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to log out the user. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#310](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#310)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#310](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#310)]

summary.span: 使用操作系统提供的标识自动对当前用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Automatically authenticates the current user by using the identity supplied by the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将应用程序配置为使用 类时， `static` 方法将使用此方法实现其实现。When you configure your application to use the class, the `static` method will use this method for its implementation. 方法自动对当前用户进行身份验证，并将 `static` 属性设置为 包含当前的对象 。The method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 如果为 应用程序配置了，则可以使用 对象从角色服务中检索用户角色信息。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法通过使用 Windows 身份验证对用户进行身份验证。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication.
